name: Simple Slots (itch) (YC Games)
description: Have a friend or relative with dementia? Mom, Dad, Aunt, Uncle or Grandparents? Need Something to occupy their time? I bring to you "Simple Slots". A simple game with simple features. I developed this game game in about a month or so for a lady with dementia who loved slots and needed a simplified version for a tablet. I then ported the game to PC and here it is. It's free so go download it for Android, Windows, Mac and Linux.
